articles.title: After Supporters Greet Vivek Ramaswamy With "VP" Chants, Trump Says This - NDTV
articles.description: A day after he withdrew from the 2024 US presidential race, Indian-American entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy received an enthusiastic welcome from Donald Trump's supporters while he endorsed his former rival and ex-US president.
articles.content:
As the two leaders shook hands, the crowd broke into chants of "VP, VP".

articles.title: US Presidential elections: Vivek Ramaswamy for Vice President? Donald Trump says ‘will be working with us for long time’ | Mint - Mint
articles.description: US former President Donald Trump, who registered a big win, held a rally in Atkinson, New Hampshire with fellow GOP leader Vivek Ramaswamy and thanked the Indian-American leader for endorsing him.
